channel.title: Help! I cant connect through no-ip!
channel.description:
Guys please help me! I created a server with the source as allstarscape V2. I did some stuff and I want to make it online to public so I started making a no-ip account but it didn't work! I login through localhost now. I went through the tutorials and it tells me to go to client.java/server.java and find (CTRL+F) 127.0.0.1,serverip,server,ip,ipadress,192.168.0.1 but I still cant find it! Please help me I just want to know how to connect to my server using no-ip.(NOT HAMICHI I H8 HAMICHI!)
Thanks in advance

item.title: Help! I cant connect through no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @justin89 justin89
item.description:
@justin89 wrote:

Well if u dont have uturrent downloaded, download it and change the port to 43594. Open up you moparscape or what ever client u use and just type in “localhost” or “127.0.0.1”.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! I cant connect through no-ip!

item.title: Help! I cant connect through no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @Zorc Zorc
item.description:
@Zorc wrote:

bah, dont look for 127.0.0.1 look for allstar if you use his source…

Read full topic
